document.name: Web Experience Toolkit Drupal Prototype
document.description:
This Drupal Distribution based on the Web Experience Toolkit is a pre-configured software platform that assists Governmental Departments in using a Content Management System that is already properly configured to Governmental functional and business requirements.

Brief Overview of Functionality Implemented

  • Custom Installation Profile Web Experience
  • Improved CLF Theme Integration in Drupal + Proper Inheritance with CLF_Custom
  • Complex Access Control + Workflow (Workbench Module)
  • Pre-Configured Roles + Users + Permissions
  • Multilingualism
  • WET Theme has been replaced into Module WETKIT
  • WET Libraries Integration through custom WETKIT Module
  • Installation + Configuration of best practice modules
